Articles.Content:
After the 0.22 update, I decided to land over on the island airport just off coast from the Space Center. Squad completely redesigned the entire base! You can even go inside the Flight Control tower! I also found two parts that I've never seen before next to the old capsule in the hangar.

I recognize the capsule but I've never seen that rocket engine or the part next to it.

Jeb begins the Climb!

Still Climbing...

Made it to the top! I knocked Jeb over when I was trying to jump up on the side of the window. Turns out they can't stand back up while on buildings...
didn't you see it from the dev stream?

didn't you see it from the dev stream?

No I wasn't able to watch the dev stream this update. If this was already known then I apologize for posting this.
Those parts were the old KSP parts before 0.18 rolled around, and they've been over there before this update

No I wasn't able to watch the dev stream this update. If this was already known then I apologize for posting this.

lol no, its certainly interesting, and im sure there are many forum users who haven't gotten the chance to see it yet
I saw it from launch, the runway was too sandy. Landed crashed a plane onto it, and it was neat. And yeah, that engine and fuel tank was always there.

And with the changes, MechJeb can't land on it, and it lands beside the KSC runway instead of on it.

"What?! They've gone metric again without telling us?"

Yeah I seen it right after the update, but didn't post about it.

I flew low over it in my T-1 test aircraft I use for testing new ideas on a sound aerodynamic platform.

Then I flew and landed on it with one of my helicopters to look around. May go and check out KSC2 to see how much it has changed, if at all.

And with the changes, MechJeb can't land on it, and it lands beside the KSC runway instead of on it.

"What?! They've gone metric again without telling us?"
Wait MechJeb can land planes!? I HATE landing planes - what feature is this!?
where is this?!

where is this?!

If you look out to sea from the Space Center, there are some small islands fairly close by; you can see them from the launchpad. The closest one of these has the airport, you should be able to see it quite clearly if you get close enough to it

If you like those parts, you can get them (and more) here.

They haven't been updated for the Tech Tree/Science yet (I'm busy with conventions right now), but I hope to have them updated in the next few weeks.

Here is what you get:

Pic

Edited October 22, 2013 by Fiddlestyx

Squad?! Y U SO RETRO!?

Just kidding, I quite like it that the devs don't forget about their roots

If you look out to sea from the Space Center, there are some small islands fairly close by; you can see them from the launchpad. The closest one of these has the airport, you should be able to see it quite clearly if you get close enough to it

Found it cheers! tried landing there but kinda crashed instead!

I also found two parts that I've never seen before next to the old capsule in the hangar.

Ye gods do I feel old now. XD that was the original fuel tank and original engine, back when we had... what, one, two choices? Tops?

Made it to the top! I knocked Jeb over when I was trying to jump up on the side of the window. Turns out they can't stand back up while on buildings...

Quick tip, whenever this happens (and it happens to my Kerbals quite a lot), use time warp for a second or two. It re-sets the physics and usually causes them to jump back up again.
Those parts are from pre-0.18 versions of the game, like the pod.

Wait MechJeb can land planes!? I HATE landing planes - what feature is this!?

"Spaceplane guidance".

Back on topic, I genuinely didn't know about this redesign. It looks great

Yes, I missed the stream

I just recently started playing KSP and I had never heard of that place before I randomly stumbled across the place yesterday.

I was very surprised, never expected there to be any other buildings on the entire planet. xD
